attributes.action: Reduce the number of immigrants allowed to stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We seem to be taking more than our fair share of immigrants compared to the rest of Europe.  We also seem to be giving them more rights and control over what we can say or do.  Nowadays, if an Asian/Eastern European/Middle Eastern is unhappy with something it seems as if straight away it ends up as a coloured issue or a religious one.  You never hear us Brits saying "Is it 'cos I'm white" or the OAP's saying "Is it 'cos I'm old" maybe were just so use to not complaining anymore because it has no effect!

rejection.details: there are lots of anti-immigration petitions on the site already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
